metadata.title: The Golden Girls Women's Four Golden Girls Moon T-Shirt
features: OFFICIALLY LICENSED Golden Girls / ABC Product
Large Front Graphic Design Of Sophia, Blanche, Dorothy And Rose Under A F (Great Play Off Of The Popular Three Wolf Moon Design)
Logo And Wash Instructions Printed On Inside Of Shirt / Tagless Collar
description: Four mature women live together in Miami and experience the joys and angst of their golden years. Strong-willed Dorothy, spacey Rose, lusty Southern belle Blanche and matriarch Sophia, Dorothy's mom, occasionally clash but are there for one another in the end. This shirt plays off the popular "three Wolf Moon shirt" with graphics of all 4 characters under a bright full moon. Made of 100% cotton fabric blend
metadata.details: {"Product Dimensions": "12 x 9 x 0.75 inches; 8 Ounces", "Department": "Girls", "Date First Available": "April 9, 2018", "Manufacturer": "Bioworld"}
